P

percents - Variable in class renderer.Pixel
 
PINK - Static variable in class primitives.Color
 
Pixel - Class in renderer
Pixel is an internal helper class whose objects are associated with a Render object that they are generated in scope of.
Pixel() - Constructor for class renderer.Pixel
Default constructor for secondary Pixel objects
Pixel(int, int, Render) - Constructor for class renderer.Pixel
The constructor for initializing the main follow up Pixel object
pixels - Variable in class renderer.Pixel
 
Plane - Class in geometries
this class represent a Plane with point and vector normal that standing on the point
Plane(Point3D, Point3D, Point3D) - Constructor for class geometries.Plane
Constructor of Plane from 3 points on its surface
the points are ordered from right to left we calculate the normal on the constructor to avoid repeated request of the normal
Plane(Point3D, Vector) - Constructor for class geometries.Plane
Constructor of Plane from point and vector normal that standing on the point
point - Variable in class geometries.Intersectable.GeoPoint
the point on the geometry that we get the color from
Point3D - Class in primitives
this is a basic point for RayTracing project in 3D
Point3D(double, double, double) - Constructor for class primitives.Point3D
Constructor for Point3D generate an object of Point3D from 3 axis values
PointLight - Class in elements
this class represent a point light like normal lamp.
PointLight(Color, Point3D) - Constructor for class elements.PointLight
constructor for PointLight
Polygon - Class in geometries
Polygon class represents two-dimensional polygon in 3D Cartesian coordinate system
Polygon(Point3D...) - Constructor for class geometries.Polygon
Polygon constructor based on vertices list.
primitives - package primitives
 
print - Variable in class renderer.Render
flag of printing progress percentage
print() - Method in class renderer.Pixel
Debug print of progress percentage - must be run from the main thread
printGrid(int, Color) - Method in class renderer.Render
Produces a pixel-sized matrix of the view plane and colors rows and columns
